profileData.name: Shakir M. Shaker
profileData.title: AI Engineer
profileData.bio: I build AI systems that solve real problems. Over the past few years, I've taken companies from having no AI to running it across their operations - from web agents handling customer inquiries to ML models predicting patient outcomes. I'm hands-on technical but also comfortable working with leadership to figure out where AI actually makes sense.

experience.title: Head of AI
experience.description:
- Joined when the company had zero AI - now it runs through most of what we do
- Architected and deployed web agents on our websites that handle both lead generation and customer support autonomously
- Built an automatic email drafting system for customer service that now generates 4,000+ email drafts monthly
- Led the call transcription project - we use it to spot trends, extract action items, flag follow-ups, and catch unhappy customers before they churn
- Work directly with the C-suite to decide where AI fits and where it doesn't

experience.title: Founder
experience.description:
- Built an AI email client from scratch - handles everything from understanding context to drafting replies
- Currently used by 50+ daily active users
- Did all the technical work myself: backend, frontend, LLM integration, and deployment

experience.title: AI Engineer
experience.description: Worked across portfolio companies to find where AI could actually help. Built tools for business intelligence and energy recommendations. Spent a lot of time helping teams understand what AI can and can't do - important when expectations are high.

experience.title: Research Assistant
experience.description: Built ML models to predict mortality risk in acutely hospitalized patients. Led the technical work and data analysis. The research got published - one of those projects where the models actually have a chance to help real patients.

experience.title: Associate
experience.description: Consulted on AI and data projects for large clients. Helped them figure out which problems were actually worth solving with AI, then built the tools to do it. Learned a lot about how big organizations adopt (or resist) new technology.

education.degree: Master of Engineering - Human-Centered Artificial Intelligence
education.description: Focused on AI, human interaction, and LLMs. Did this in 2 years while working full-time. Thesis: 12/12, GPA: 10.1/12
Machine learning, data visualization, statistics. Finished in 1 year and 9 months.
